title: Saint West 'proposes' to Kim Karshashian in the cutest way
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Saint West pretended to propose to his mum Kim Kardashian in the most adorable way on Keeping Up With The Kardashians – and our hearts can’t take it.

In scenes aired from season 17, Kim relived the moment her husband Kanye West popped the question as they looked to renew their wedding vows after five years of marriage.

Kim told Saint the story of how Kayne gave her the engagement ring as she helped to get him dressed.

‘When daddy proposed he gave me this ring, isn’t that cool?’ she explained.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Saint then asked: ‘What happened when he gave it to you?’

Kim then told her son the story of how Kayne got down on one knee at a baseball match.

She added: ‘We were actually on a baseball field and daddy got on his knee and he was playing all this music and he said, “Will you marry me?” and I said, “Yes daddy”.

How adorable is this? (Picture: Hayu)

Our hearts can’t take it! (Picture: Hayu)

‘And so he puts the ring on my finger and that’s what happens when you get engaged, and that means you want to marry someone.’

Kim then showed Saint how you propose to someone by putting her sparkly ring on her son’s tiny finger, before he asked her marry him back.

Kim and Kayne knew each other for years, before they got married in 2014. They now share four children together, with North being the eldest.

The original internet breaker gave birth to North on June 2013, and to her second, son Saint West, in December 2015. Then came along their third child Chicago before Psalm, who was born this year.

Kimye’s vows renewal actually came after the birth of Psalm, who was born via surrogate on 10 May.

She said: ‘Our surrogate is so amazing. She had the easiest delivery. She pushed literally maybe one time. Kourtney and Kanye were in the room with me.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I feel so complete. I really do feel like four is the perfect number for me. I feel so full in the best way, but I’m done.’

Keeping Up With the Kardashians airs Sundays on E!.

description: Saint West 'proposes' to Kim Karshashian in the cutest way in a clip from Keeping Up With The Kardashians.
